Class Fit_Sphere

java.lang.Object
  Fit_Sphere
All Implemented Interfaces:
ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter
public class Fit_Sphere
extends java.lang.Object
implements ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter

Takes point selections from ROI manager and returns the centroid and radius of a best fit sphere Ported from Angelo Tardugno's C++

Version:
0.1
Author:
Michael Doube and Angelo Tardugno

public double[] fitSphere(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                          ij.plugin.frame.RoiManager roiMan)
Fit a sphere to a set of 3D point ROI's

Parameters:
imp - ImagePlus
roiMan - RoiManager containing points placed on sphere
Returns:
double[4] containing calibrated (x,y,z,r) coordinates of the centre and radius, r.
